thumb.title: Metaverse Blues (Epic Games Checkmate)__
thumb.description: Verse 1 I’m standin’ in the metaverse wasteland, chasin’ a digital dream so wide I’m standin’ in the metaverse wasteland, chasin’ a digital dream so wide Epic Games rolled in with Fortnite’s glow, puttin’ checkmate on the other side Verse 2 They teamed up with Hadean, dreamin’ big to scale the sky They teamed up with Hadean, dreamin’ big to scale the sky Don’t need no blockchain, their metaverse shines with fun, oh my Verse 3 Interoperability’s the key, Rocket League cars ridin’ through Interoperability’s the key, Rocket League cars ridin’ through Sony and LEGO join the crew, buildin’ the future, me and you Verse 4 Ain’t leanin’ on no NFTs, pure play’s the rule I keep Ain’t leanin’ on no NFTs, pure play’s the rule I keep Epic Games’ metaverse, where the whole world meets in a digital deep Verse 5 Unreal Engine’s hummin’ loud, creators shapin’ dreams so true Unreal Engine’s hummin’ loud, creators shapin’ dreams so true Checkmate’s comin’ in the metaverse, Epic Games breakin’ through
